table.name: vtiger_cbzone
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbzone` ( `cbzoneid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cbzoneno` varchar(56) default NULL, `cbzone` varchar(200) default NULL, `active` varchar(3) default NULL, index (`cbzone`), index (`active`), PRIMARY KEY (`cbzoneid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbzonecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbzonecf` ( `cbzoneid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbzoneid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
